channel.title: Posts on Mansfield.ink
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mansfield.ink

item.title: Book 1: The Definitive Guide to Underwriting Multifamily Acquisitions
item.description: To start the year with a really exciting piece of literature, I read The Definitive Guide to Underwriting Multifamily Acquisitions. My wife and I have recently begun investing in real estate. With an eye on the future I wanted to get an idea of how larger buildings are analyzed. Instead of repeating the details of the book (which is quite detailed) I will go over some concepts I learned. The book is a quick read if you like analysis of any kind.

item.title: 2022 Intro
item.description: It’s 2022. The year the world will hopefully go back to normal. With a new year most people will hope to be a better person in a year’s time. Most people fail. This year I’m not hoping, I’m doing. I started this to keep myself accountable, retain more of what I wrote, and inspire others to do the same. Last year I noticed I had developed an addiction to screens and watching video online.
